nodes.text: The Trophy Wall was a large exhibit located in Exovar's Emporium. It contained mementos of Luskin Exovar's adventures, and was protected by defensive shields and a hypersonic alarm system. Among the mementos on display were a full Imperial Royal Guard uniform, artwork from Master Furva Keill of Alderaan, several Jedi lightsabers, and two battle-worn Thyrsus Sun Guard helmets. Visitors to the Emporium were allowed to leave their own mementos, serving as chance at immortality of their adventures.
